Lime and chile keep this slushy spicy and bright. This recipe is part of the Healthyish slushy trifecta. Check out the other two here and here.Ingredients6 servings2large mangoes, peeled, cut into 1" pieces, frozen (about 4 cups)2½cups coconut water⅔cup fresh lime juice (from about 4½ limes)¾tsp. kosher salt1tsp. Aleppo-style pepper, plus more for servingPreparationStep 1Blend mango, coconut water, lime juice, salt, 1 tsp. pepper, and 2 cups ice in a blender until smooth. Divide among glasses, then sprinkle with more pepper.Step 2Do Ahead: Slushy can be made 1 hour ahead. Store in blender jar in freezer, then reblend on high speed to reincorporate.How would you rate Beauty-Food Mango Slushy?Leave a ReviewTell us what you thinkReviews (1)Back to TopTriangleTrying freezing the coconut water in ice trays!
